speaker: Moderator
content: Welcome to the panel discussion on climate change.

speaker: Dr Smith
content: Thank you. The data is clear that temperatures are rising.

speaker: Prof Jones
content: I agree but we need to focus on actionable solutions.

speaker: Dr Chen
content: Renewable energy adoption is accelerating faster than predicted.

speaker: Senator Brown
content: Policy changes are essential but must be economically viable.

speaker: Dr Smith
content: The cost of solar has dropped ninety percent in a decade.

speaker: Activist Garcia
content: We cannot wait for gradual change. The crisis demands urgency.

speaker: Prof Jones
content: Education and public awareness are equally important.

speaker: Dr Chen
content: International cooperation is the only path forward.

speaker: Moderator
content: Thank you all. Lets open it up to audience questions.

speaker: Senator Brown
content: I would like to add one more point about carbon pricing.

speaker: Activist Garcia
content: And I want to highlight environmental justice concerns.
